title: Integrate some additional stream and block ciphers
body: My question: Is there a plan to integrate several crypto-primitives to go as additional packages? If so, some implementation ( Serpent, HC128/HC256 ), ready for integration, can be found [here](https://github.com/andhamm/crypto). I'm currently working on Chacha20 (the orig. and the RFC version) - so if there's the wish for additional cryptographic in go, may take a look.
